overview: After a 3 year hiatus, Christina Aguchi has returned for one more scene! She has returned as a well known international award winning feature dancer and elite circuit performer. As for a performance on camera Christina brought it. Christina takes you right into the VIP room for the ultimate private dance. And yes she does her very first anal scene to boot! I'm talking about a serious ass pounding and ATMs with a smile.
title: POV Junkie 3
